name: Open Hand Technique
description: Whenever you hit a creature with one of the attacks granted by your Flurry of Blows, you can impose one of the following effects on that target: It must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone, it must make a Strength saving throw (if it fails, you can push it up to 15 feet away), or it can't take reactions until the end of your next turn.
